ComicInfo.Summary:
SOMETHING WICKED, PART ONE
One of the greatest evils in the history of the Grimm Universe has been risen from his imprisonment by Bloody Bones... and, together, they plan on storming Arcane Acre. Meanwhile, oblivious to the danger outside, Ali and Mary use their powers over life and death to attempt a resurrection spell.
Today, death visits Arcane Acre once again...
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Giuseppe Cafaro & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Pasquale Qualano & Ylenia di Napoli | 2 | C | Cover C | Paolo Pantalena & Ula Mos | 3 |
